Class IRProcessing

java.lang.Object
IRProcessing
All Implemented Interfaces:
IElectionProcessing
public class IRProcessing extends Object implements IElectionProcessing
IRProcessing class used for processing an IR election. Implements IElectionProcessing, an interface outlining election processing.
Author:
tracy255, Caleb Tracy. Ashton Berg.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) ProcessResults
    auditFileOutput
    instantiates a ProcessResults instance, which is used to write election proceedings to an audit file.
    private static ArrayList<Candidate>
    candidates
    an ArrayList of Candidate objects that represents the candidates in the election
    (package private) int
    curBallotIndex
    an int used to keep track of the current ballot index for distributing ballots from multiple files
    private ArrayList<Integer>
    exhausted_pile
    an arrayList holding the number of lost/deleted ballots for every round.
    (package private) int
    initial_total
    an integer to track the initial total number of ballots for the output table.
    private ArrayList<IRRow>
    table
    an arrayList of IRRows, used for each row in the table outputted at the end of an election.
    (package private) int
    totalNumBallots
    an integer that keeps track of the total number of ballots that were cast in an election.

  • Constructor Details

    • IRProcessing

      public IRProcessing(BufferedReader[] brs) throws IOException
      Calls the setCandidates() and distributeBallots() to set up the processing of an IR election and then calls processElection() to process the election. Writes to audit file information about election proceedings.
      Parameters:
      brs - a BufferedReader Array, holds buffered readers that each buffer the input from a FileReader that is reading from an election information csv file
      Throws:
      IOException - throws an IOException if distributeBallots() throws an IOException when called

  • Method Details

    • processElection

      public String processElection()
      Does the work of actually running an IR election to determine the winner and losers. Writes proceedings to audit file.
      Specified by:
      processElection in interface IElectionProcessing
      Returns:
      the name of the election winner as a String, "FAILURE" if error.

    • getParties

      public String[] getParties()
      Gets a list of all the political parties that candidates belong to.
      Returns:
      a String[] containing the political parties of candidates as Strings

    • getCandidates

      public String[] getCandidates()
      Gets a list of the candidates in the election.
      Specified by:
      getCandidates in interface IElectionProcessing
      Returns:
      a String[] containing the names of the candidates as Strings

    • getCandidateArray

      public ArrayList<Candidate> getCandidateArray()
      Gets the list of candidates in the election.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Candidate objects that represent the candidates in the election

    • setCandidates

      private void setCandidates(BufferedReader br)
      Reads from the election information csv file to create the Candidates.
      Parameters:
      br - BufferedReader, buffers the input from a FileReader that is reading from the election information csv file

    • distributeBallots

      private void distributeBallots(BufferedReader br) throws IOException
      Reads from the election information csv file to distribute Ballots to the Candidates.
      Parameters:
      br - BufferedReader, buffers the input from a FileReader that is reading from the election information csv file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error occurs when reading file.

    • determineLoser

      public Candidate determineLoser()
      Determines which candidate to eliminate from the election. Chooses the candidate with the least first choice votes. If there is a tie for candidates with the least first choice votes, a fair coin toss is simulated by randomly choosing a loser.
      Returns:
      the Candidate that is the loser

    • redistributeBallots

      public void redistributeBallots(Candidate cand)
      Takes a candidate and redistributes their ballots to other candidates. Gives each ballot to the next ranked candidate on that ballot. Accounts for lost ballots when there are no more rankings.
      Parameters:
      cand - the candidate whose votes will be redistributed

    • printTable

      private void printTable()
      Uses the table instance variable to populate and prints a table containing election information for each round. Takes no parameters and returns nothing.
